title: Takasugi-san no Chibiyan Hero
original_name: 高杉さんのチビヤンヒーロー
sinopse:
Koyuki Takasugi, who is gloomy, shy, and 180cm tall, is secretly fond of Masakatsu Komaeda, who is short in stature but has a big heart. Will the distance between these two obvious mismatches be shortened?!

(Source: Seikaisha, translated)
